https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aRgcU5YrChGjvk5SrFvO2rKqeBa.jpg Francesco and Claudia are best friends. They're inseparable and tell each other everything, until another man enters the picture stealing Claudia's heart. Francesco then realizes that friendship between man and woman is a complicated thing. A Woman as a Friend
